# package4fun

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

The goal of package4fun is to collect a set of fun functions

## Installation

You can install the development version of package4fun from [GitHub](https://github.com/) with: <br>
`install.packages("devtools")` <br>
`devtools::install_github("Scott-Zuo/package4fun")`


## Example

This is a basic example which shows you how to solve a common problem:

```{r example}
library(package4fun)
## basic example code
```
